title: i need help got suspention and i dont know why

replies.body:
https://emojipedia-us.s3.amazonaws.com/thumbs/120/apple/96/clapping-hands-sign_1f44f.png Stop 
https://emojipedia-us.s3.amazonaws.com/thumbs/120/apple/96/clapping-hands-sign_1f44f.png Telling 
https://emojipedia-us.s3.amazonaws.com/thumbs/120/apple/96/clapping-hands-sign_1f44f.png People 
https://emojipedia-us.s3.amazonaws.com/thumbs/120/apple/96/clapping-hands-sign_1f44f.png To 
https://emojipedia-us.s3.amazonaws.com/thumbs/120/apple/96/clapping-hands-sign_1f44f.png Kill 
https://emojipedia-us.s3.amazonaws.com/thumbs/120/apple/96/clapping-hands-sign_1f44f.png Themselves

It probably wasn't the catalyst specifically, but it's a common issue I've been seeing over the last year and it needs to stop.  You'll want to hit us up in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) so our PB team can give you better context on your specific account.
Lol, the second you tell someone to kill themselves you deserve a permaban, not even kidding.
